metadata.title: Portfolio-ga Horumariye ML & Full-Stack
metadata.description: Portfolio-ga horumariye ML iyo full-stack ah oo dhisa web apps, APIs, mobile apps, dashboards, iyo nidaamyo AI ku shaqeeya oo diyaar u ah production.

hero.headline: Anigu waxaan ahay Eng Moscab Bashir Hassan, horumariye ML iyo Full-Stack ah oo dhisa alaabooyin dijitaal casri ah.
hero.subheadline: Waxaan naqshadeeyaa oo dhisaa nidaamyo web iyo mobile ah oo ML ku shaqeeya anigoo adeegsanaya Next.js/React, Python/FastAPI, Node.js, PHP, iyo SQL databases si ay ugu shaqeeyaan workflows ganacsi oo dhab ah.

about.title: ML + full-stack engineering wax ku ool ah oo u shaqeeya hawlgal dhab ah
about.description: Waxaan naqshadeeyaa oo dhisaa nidaamyo production ah oo isku dara frontend, backend APIs, databases, iyo astaamo ML/AI ah si ay ugu shaqeeyaan kooxo iyo hay'ado dhab ah.

skills.title: Tech stack-ka lagu geeyo ML iyo full-stack projects
skills.description: Qalab wax ku ool ah oo ka kooban frontend, APIs, databases, cloud, iyo ML integration.

projects.title: ML apps iyo nidaamyo full-stack ah oo la xushay
projects.description: Ku kala shaandhee category ama ku raadi magaca, stack-ka, ama features-ka.

services.title: Adeegyo ML + Full-Stack ah oo loogu talagalay alaabooyin casri ah
services.description: Laga bilaabo AI-enabled features ilaa web/mobile systems dhammaystiran oo leh architecture la dayactiri karo iyo UX nadiif ah.

contact.title: Aan dhisno nidaamkaaga xiga
contact.description: Soo dir baahidaada, waxaanan kuugu soo jawaabi doonaa qorshe shaqaynaya.

highlights.cleanUiTemplates: UI Nadiif ah + Templates Daabacaad u Diyaar ah

projects.noResults: Mashruucyo ku habboon shaandhayntan/raadintan lama helin.

institutionalSystems.title: ML-Powered Web Platforms
institutionalSystems.description: Web applications casri ah oo isku dara UI production ah, backend APIs, iyo astaamo caqli leh oo loogu talagalay workflows ganacsi.

inventoryModules.title: Detection & Classification Tools
inventoryModules.description: Astaamo AI/ML ah oo loogu talagalay detection, classification, scoring, iyo review workflows gudaha apps-ka.

reportsDashboards.title: Analytics Dashboards & Reporting
reportsDashboards.description: Dashboards isdhexgal leh, warbixinno hawlgal, iyo decision-support views oo leh UX nadiif ah iyo data pipelines la isku halayn karo.

mobileApps.title: Flutter App Development
mobileApps.description: Flutter mobile apps oo leh API/backend integration ammaan ah si loogu adeego users, staff, iyo workflows hawlgal.

apiDevelopment.title: Full-Stack APIs & Backend Systems
apiDevelopment.description: Adeegyo backend la miisaami karo oo leh Node.js, PHP, ama Python/FastAPI kana kooban auth, roles, iyo business logic.

aiFeatures.title: AI/ML Integration & Automation
aiFeatures.description: AI-assisted search, metadata extraction, automation flows, iyo model integration gudaha systems-ka production.

testimonials.placeholderBody: Beddel placeholder-kan adigoo gelinaya markhaati macmiil iyo natiijo la cabbiri karo.

form.name: Magac
form.subject: Mawduuc

placeholders.name: Magacaaga oo buuxa
placeholders.subject: Nooca project-ka (ML app, website, API, dashboard...)
placeholders.message: Faahfaahi fikraddaada, ujeeddooyinka, features-ka, iyo waqtiga aad rabto...

form.success: Farriinta si guul leh ayaa loo diray (mock).
form.error: Waxbaa khaldamay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

validation.messageMin: Farriintu waa inay noqotaa ugu yaraan 10 xaraf.

footer.languageNote: Boggan waxaa lagu heli karaa English iyo Somali.
